remarks: Embedding of permutation signs restricted to a set without a single element into a ring.  (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2019.)
statement:
psgndif.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
psgndif.s $e |- S = ( pmSgn ` N ) $.
psgndif.z $e |- Z = ( pmSgn ` ( N \ { K } ) ) $.
psgndif $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ K e. N ) -> ( Q e. { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } -> ( Z ` ( Q |` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) = ( S ` Q ) ) ) $.
$d K q $.
$d P q $.
$d Q q $.
